hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wal: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Sword#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Potion Bottle# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Morpha#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Saria's Song#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Sword#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
